<<<<<<< HEAD
The Christian life part III. Wherein the great duties of justice, mercy, and mortification are fully explained and inforced. Vol. IV. By John Scott D.D. late rector of St. Giles's in the Fields. Christian life. Vol. 4. Scott, John, 1639-1695. White, Robert, 1645-1703, engraver.
[28], 445, [3] p. : port. (metal cut)
printed for Walter Kettilby at the Bishop's Head in St. Paul's Church-Yard, London : 1696.
With a table of contents. With 3 final advertisment pages. The portrait of the author is signed: R. White sculp. Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.
=======

[28], 445, [3] p. : port. (metal cut)
printed for Walter Kettilby at the Bishop's Head in St. Paul's Church-Yard, London : 1696.
With a table of contents. With 3 final advertisment pages. The portrait of the author is signed: R. White sculp. Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.
